promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic epic chameleon dark-type pokemon wearing white bracers. It can be found in castle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or chameleon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Braceleon, a a gigantic epic chameleon dark-type pokemon. It can be found in castle-like environments It has the following abilities: Nipping Cyclone. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "chameleon", "dark" or "Braceleon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, chameleon-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: This massive fortress-dweller, known as Braceleon, lurks in shadows. With its Nipping Cyclone, it gracefully deceives intruders with an ink-like haze.
